article_title: Players vote to approve NFL owners' proposed labor deal
article_description: NFL players have voted to approve a new collective bargaining agreement  CBA  that will expand the playoff field and allow owners the option to lengthen the regular season  the NFL Players  Association said on Sunday
article_content: Reuters    NFL players have voted to approve a new collective bargaining agreement  CBA  that will expand the playoff field and allow owners the option to lengthen the regular season  the NFL Players  Association said on Sunday   The new 10 year labor deal    1322 chars
